SEARCH

Package nl.pim16aap2.util.reflection

@NonNullByDefault package nl.pim16aap2.util.reflection
This package contains a set of tools that makes reflection lookups easier. The tools in this package simplify the process of using reflection in Java, and make it easier to perform complex reflection lookup operations.

The various utilities are accessed through the ReflectionBuilder class.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    nl.pim16aap2.util
    The package contains general-purpose utilities that are not directly related to the AnimatedArchitecture project.
    nl.pim16aap2.util.codegeneration
    Contains some utility classes for generating code.
    nl.pim16aap2.util.logging
    This package contains a set of utilities the for logging framework.
  • Class
    Description
    ClassFinder
    Represents an implementation of ReflectionFinder for Class objects.
    ConstructorFinder
    Represents a ReflectionFinder that can find Constructors.
    ConstructorFinder.ConstructorFinderInSource
    Represents an implementation of ReflectionFinder
    EnumValuesFinder
    Represents a ReflectionFinder for enum values.
    EnumValuesFinder.EnumFieldFinderFactory
    Factory for EnumValuesFinder objects.
    EnumValuesFinder.IndexedEnumValueFinder
    Represents an implementation of ReflectionFinder to retrieve an enum value by its index.
    EnumValuesFinder.NamedEnumValueFinder
    Represents an implementation of ReflectionFinder to retrieve an enum value by its name.
    FieldFinder
    Represents a ReflectionFinder for fields.
    FieldFinder.FieldFinderInSource
    Represents the second step of the field finder, after the source class has been specified.
    FieldFinder.MultipleFieldsFinder
    Represents an implementation of ReflectionFinder to retrieve all fields in a class of a given type.
    FieldFinder.NamedFieldFinder<T>
    Represents an implementation of ReflectionFinder to retrieve a field by its name.
    FieldFinder.TypedFieldFinder<T>
    Represents an implementation of ReflectionFinder to retrieve a field by its type.
    IAccessibleSetter<T>
    Shared interface for any type of reflection interaction system that can be used to set a reflection object as accessible.
    IAnnotationFinder<T>
    Allows specifying a set of annotations that a reflection object should have.
    MethodFinder
    Represents a ReflectionFinder for methods.
    MethodFinder.MethodFinderBase
    Represents an implementation of ReflectionFinder.ReflectionFinderWithParameters that can be used to find a method.
    MethodFinder.MethodFinderInSource
    Represents the second step of the method finder, after the source class has been specified.
    ParameterGroup
    Represents a group of parameters that describes, for example, the input arguments of a Constructor.
    ParameterGroup.Builder
    Represents a builder for ParameterGroups.
    ReflectionBuilder
    Contains several static methods to easily perform several types of complicated reflection lookups.
    ReflectionFinder<T,U extends ReflectionFinder<T,U>>
    Represents a class that can find reflection objects in classes.
    ReflectionFinder.ReflectionFinderWithParameters<T,U extends ReflectionFinder.ReflectionFinderWithParameters<T,U>>
    Represents a type of ReflectionFinder that also has a group of parameters.
